name: mihdan/elementor-yandex-maps
description: Elementor Yandex Maps Widget. Easily add multiple address pins onto the same map with support for different map types (Road Map/Satellite/Hybrid/Terrain) and custom map style. Freely edit info window content of your pins with the standard [Elementor](https://www.kobzarev.com/r/elementor/) text editor. And many more custom map options.
